summary: Let\'s you find and craft four padded robes and a pair of padded boots. (Uses the vanilla mage robes models)
descriptionHtml:
:-:Authors note:-:
This was originali just a private mod, since I liked the look of the mage robes, but I actually needed some armour so I wouldn\'t die all the time. 
12.03.2013
I will not continue to update this mod, I simply dosnt have the time at this point of my life.
I may come back someday...

:-:Info about the robes:-:
The robes are not overpowered in any way, with a base armour rating at 13 and 17 points.
They are not upgradable because one would have to rip the clothing to apply extra protection, rendering the the robe useless.
They are only worth 60-100 Gold Coins.
They can be found under the \'\'Leather\'\' tab at any forge in Skyrim or in a backpack not far from the cave you exit when you escape Helgen\'s doom.

:-:Changelog:-:
2.0
Added the Mountain Traveler\'s Padded Robe and Fine Padded Boots
1.0
The Padded Traveler\'s Robe was relesed

:-:Requests/Ideas:-:
If there is a outfit in the world of Skyrim you would like to see \'\'Padded\'\', you can comment here with the outfit in question and I\'ll do it because I have nothing better to do :D

:-:Mods that this mod goes good with:-:
\'\'Bandolier - Bags and Pouches\'\' By Dragten [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]
\'\'Leather Backpack\'\' By Tupii [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13732]

:-:Shoutbox:-:
Omg, why are so many people looking at this? I didn\'t think that I would get like 1000+ views .3.
Sorry for not updating lately, trying to fix my skyrim game files
author: Delta65
